resources.title: Developer Resources
resources.description: Explore the latest resources on web development, UI/UX design, blogs, and more to stay ahead in the industry.

resourcesCta.title: Resources for Web Developers
resourcesCta.description: Discover a treasure trove of curated resources for web developers. Boost your skills and stay up-to-date with the latest tools and technologies.

resourcesSection.title: Resources for Developers
resourcesSection.description: If you're looking for useful resources for any purpose, explore the Resources page.

resourceItems.title: Developer Communities
resourceItems.description: Spaces where you can share knowledge, ask questions, and resolve doubts with other passionate developers.

resourceItems.title: Places to Learn
resourceItems.description: Platforms offering a variety of web development courses to enhance your skills and knowledge.

resourceItems.title: Places to Practice
resourceItems.description: Sites where you can perform exercises and practical challenges to apply and reinforce your coding skills.

resourceItems.title: Useful Tools
resourceItems.description: Resources and applications that help you optimize and improve your daily workflow in development.

resourceItems.title: Documentation
resourceItems.description: Guides and official documentation on popular technologies, offering best practices and useful resources.

resourceItems.title: Libraries and Frameworks
resourceItems.description: Collections of pre-built code that allow you to speed up development and improve the quality of your projects.
